title: Feminine Fashions in India
creator_credit: Dilip Jamdar, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: Presents the colorful costumes worn by women of India as their daily dress. The sari is the most commonly worn style, others shown include the Rajasthani ghagra, bodice and odhani, salvar kamiz and dupatta of Punjab and garara of Uttar Pradesh.
creator_credit_for_label: Dilip Jamdar, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
